item.description:
I'm planning to do a practice ride and run of the Westborough Sprint course this weekend.

I'll be doing two laps of the bike course and one of the run course.

Here's a link to where the transition area will be. I will park on the dirt road along the side of the lake.


Event Distance and Course Maps: 

The Bike: The bike course will be 13.9 miles along the roads of Westborough, Northborough, Marlborough and Southborough. This course will not be closed to traffic and features a variety of rolling hills. The exact route can be found with a click here. You can also download the bike course cue sheet.

The Run: After returning from the bike course and racking your bike in transition , athletes will head out onto the run course which is approximately 3 miles. The first 1.75 miles of the run (approximately) are on the trails surrounding Lake Chauncy. This is a very scenic stretch that includes some shady tree cover, but understand these are trails which feature sections of grass, loose gravel and some roots -- nothing too adventurous, but enough for you to pay attention so you don't twist an ankle.  After exiting the trails athletes will turn left on Chauncy Street, then left on Lyman Street and left onto Hospital Road back to the finish. The last 300 yards of the run will be on grass across playing fields (very spectator friendly!). This is a scenic, flat course with a few rolling hills. Aid stations with water and Hammer Nutrition Heed electrolyte drink will be available at run aid stations near mile 1 and mile 2.   Click here to see the run course.

Directions:
The race venue is located at 288 Lyman Street in Westborough MA.  Lyman Street is accessible from either Route 9 Eastbound or Westbound.  Travelling westbound on Route 9, you will make a right on Lyman St.  Travelling eastbound on Rte. 9, you will make a left on Lyman Street.  The turn for Lyman Street is at a traffic light.  See below for directions on where to park.



For more info on this race go to the Sun Multisport Events website.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be where the transition area is going to be.
item.name: Westborough Sprint Triathlon: Bike/Run Practice
